abstract: German freighter Troja set afire by crew after interception by Brit cruiser; map
snippet: The British freighter Southgate yesterday reported herself attacked by a submarine approximately 130 miles northeast of San Juan, Puerto Rico, and apparently well inside the neutrality zone averaging 300 miles proclaimed by the Panama Conference....

headline.main: SHIP REPORTS U--BOAT ATTACK IN U. S. ZONE; REDS ENTERING VIBORG, LEFT AFIRE BY FINNS; WELLES TOLD NAZI AIMS, SEES HITLER TODAY; AID SPED TO VESSEL 3 Destroyers and Coast Guard Cutter on Way to British Freighter CRAFT OFF PUERTO RICO No Details of Attack Given-- German Ship Is Scuttled Off Netherland West Indies

lead_paragraph: The British freighter Southgate yesterday reported herself attacked by a submarine approximately 130 miles northeast of San Juan, Puerto Rico, and apparently well inside the neutrality zone averaging 300 miles proclaimed by the Panama Conference.
